title: Teams
description: A fully-featured video conferencing platform that supports video call, group chat, authentication, displaying network quality status, background filters, etc. Equipped to handle 25+ participants exchanging media via an SFU provided by Twilio.

title: Mausam
description: Mausam is a web app that fetches the weather data for the next 6 days from the Metaweather API. This application was created as a submission to a DevChallenges challenge.

title: Tiiime
description: A UI/UX prototyping project. Tiiime is a crowdsourced planner that notifies users of events/activities that are scheduled by the channels of IIIT Delhi, allows them to create their own events, and propose changes to existing events. The proposed changes are reflected on all the usersâ€™ apps (crowdsourcing).

title: IIITD Playbook
description: The playbook was created to provide IIITD students with multiple strategies that other students use, their experiences and stories, tools they can use to help them along their way through college.

title: Color Switch
description: A clone of the popular game Color Switch for desktop. Utilised concepts of Object-Oriented and Event-Driven programming. Worked in a team of 2.

title: lohanish
description: Coded a Linux shell called 'lohanish' implementing a total of 30 commands using C. Utilised several standard C and Linux libraries.
